Parameters: MediaDrm: the MediaDrm object on which the event occurred This value must never be null.
byte: the DRM session ID on which the event occurred This value must never be null.
long: the new expiration time for the keys in the session. The time is in milliseconds, relative to the Unix epoch. A time of 0 indicates that the keys never expire.
onExpirationUpdate(android.media.MediaDr.Description: Called when a session expiration update occurs, to inform the app about the change in expiration time
onExpirationUpdate(android.media.MediaDr.FullName: public abstract void onExpirationUpdate (MediaDrm md, byte[] sessionId, long expirationTime)

ClassDesc: Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when a drm session expiration update occurs
